lang.word_default: Click OK to cancel this mail
The number of posts for the mail recipient
The member name of the mail recipient
The join date of the mail recipient
The member ID of the mail recipient
The time that the most number of members were online
You may use the following 'quick tags' in your mail and they will be converted when the mail is sent.
Send to members who joined n days ago
Send to members whose last visit was n days ago
Send mail in HTML format? (Full HTML formatting & and tags allowed)
Honor the 'Send me any updates seny by the board administrator' setting? This will only mail members who have opted in.

Clicking the 'Start Sending The Mail' button below will activate the task manager's send bulk mail function which will send the mail in batches until the all the mail has been sent. You can watch the progress from the main Bulk Mail screen and cancel the mail from being sent.
We strongly recommend that you opt to send 20 mails per cycle as a maximum. Any more per cycle could severly affect performance of your server while the mail is being sent out.

As the mail is sent out in cycles of n  per minute, it can take a while to process all the mail.
Sending the bulk mail to %s members

{member_name},
------------------------------------- {board_name} Statistics: ------------------------------------- Registered Users: {reg_total} Total Posts: {total_posts} Busiest Time: {busy_count} users were online on {busy_time}
------------------------------------- Handy Links ------------------------------------- Board Address: {board_url} Log In: {board_url}?app=core&module=global&section=login Lost Password Recovery: {board_url}?app=core&module=global&section=lostpass
------------------------------------- How to unsubscribe ------------------------------------- Visit your email preferences ({board_url}?app=core&module=usercp) and ensure that the box for 'Send me any updates sent by the board administrator' is unchecked and submit the form

Administrators cannot be promoted - they're already at the top!
This is the number of days in which the number of changes are made. For example 30 would mean that the user could only change their name X amount of times in a 30 day period.
Display Name Change: Max Changes per X days
This relates to the maximum number of changes a user can make to their display name within the X day period set. Use 0 to disallow users from changing their own display name.
Enter 0 or leave blank to disable limit.
Enter 0 or leave blank to allow no invites other than named recipient. (Max: 500)
Only allow %s emails in a 24 hour period
Leave bottom section blank to remove limits.
Can email members from the board?
Stops search abuse. Enter 0 or leave blank for no flood control.
Number of seconds for search flood control
Can view member profiles and member list?
Can access the site when it is offline?

Personal Photo Limits
Max upload file size and dimensions

Per Post Upload Limit
Max total file space allowed in each post or PM
Enter 0 to disable a per post limit. This number must be less than the Global Upload limit.
Enter -1 to disable uploads. Enter 0 to disable this limit.
Note that the maximum size of one single file upload is controlled by the PHP configuration on your server. This can be changed by your webhost. The current limit is:

Global Upload Limit
Max total global file space for all uploads for each user in this group. (Includes: PMs and Posts)

(Example:</span>)
Hide this group from member list?
Force this group to be anonymous?

This changes the formatting (color, font, etc) of the username of anyone in this group.
(Example:<span style='color:red'>)

You will need to first upload the image you wish to have to the server via FTP or another method. Once uploaded, you can put the path or URL here.
Upload to: /public/style_extra/team_icons/{image} (replace {image} with the image name).
Can be a relative link, i.e. public/style_extra/team_icons/admin.gif ... or it can a full URL starting with 'http://'
After the group is created you will have the option of configuring permissions for your new permission set.

Please verify before continuing. There is no undoing this action! You will be merging all content (such as topics and personal conversations) currently belonging to %s into the account %s. The %s account will then be permanantly deleted.
Select the user to merge with '%s'

This tool allows you to merge two member accounts into one. All of the member data will be retained from the account '%s'. All other data belonging to the account you select below (for example, topics and personal conversations) will then belong to %s and the selected account will be removed.

(Must be a unique word for this group)

Leave blank if you do not wish to add this field in the author details when viewing a topic.
{title} is the title of the custom field, {content} is the user added content. {key} is the form select value of the selected item in a dropdown box.
Example: <span class='ft'>{title}:</span><span class='fc'>{content}</span>
Example: <span class='ft'>{title}:</span><span class='fc'><img src='imgs/{key}'></span>
If yes, will override the above options so only admins and super moderators can see and edit this field.
Make Admin and Super Moderator Editable/Viewable Only?
If yes, field only visible to profile owner, super moderators and admins. If 'no', members can search within this field.
Field can be edited by the member?
If 'no', the member cannot edit the field but Super Moderators and Admins will be able to.
If 'yes', an error will be shown if this field is not completed.
If 'yes', the field will be shown upon registration.
Field MUST be completed and not left empty?

In sets, one set per line
Example for 'Gender' field:
m=Male
f=Female
u=Not Telling
Will produce:

m,f or u stored in database. When showing field in profile, will use value from pair (f=Female, shows 'Female')

Use: a for alpha characters.
Use: n for numerics.
If you enter one 'a', that will allow one letter. Entering 'aa' will allow two letters, and so on.
Example, for credit card numbers: nnnn-nnnn-nnnn-nnnn
Example, Date of Birth: nn-nn-nnnn
Leave blank to accept any input
For text input and text areas (in characters)

Max Characters: 250
Can be used to note hidden/required status
This is a key that can be used to identify the field (e.g. in skins)

When "ALLOW ACCESS TO THIS FUNCTION" is enabled you may set the individual access permissions for the sub-features of this particular function. Otherwise, changes to the individual access permission will have no effect.

You can then set individual permissions for each function which is grouped under this tab.

ACP permission restrictions for %s

Simply click on one of the tabs above to set the access level for all functions in this tab. If you want to choose access on a per-function level, click on the relevant link to be shown this function's options.
